data.client_settings: Release Channel: canary, Build Number: 20044, Version Hash: aa617d3b075ba073c0837aa028c08ab88e286208
data.actual_result: Everything seems to launch and work as intended, but the voice chat icons show up as a protected/private chat
data.expected_result: The servers *should* show the voice chats like the main app shows them, displaying open voice chats as open
data.short_description: In the overlay, every server voice chat shows that it is a private voice channel (that you have access to)
data.steps_to_repro: - launch game of choice - press shift & ` to enter the overlay - go to server of choice - view voice chats
